timezone: The timezone for localizing dates and times in the application. This is an IANA timezone identifier (e.g. America/New_York). If null, dates and times are localized to the user's local timezone.
cache_ttl: The time-to-live (TTL) for data cached at the edge, in milliseconds.
config_db_host: The Postgres host for the configuration database.
config_db_port: The Postgres port for the configuration database.
config_db_name: The Postgres database name for the configuration database.
config_db_user: The Postgres user for the configuration database.
config_db_password: The Postgres password for the configuration database.
use_custom_icon: Whether to use a custom app icon instead of the default icon.
favicon_name: The asset name of the app favicon.
opengraph_icon_name: The asset name of the app icon in the OpenGraph metadata.
opengraph_icon_type: The IANA media type of the app icon in the OpenGraph metadata.
opengraph_icon_alt: The alt text of the app icon in the OpenGraph metadata.
pwa_short_app_name: A short name for the app when installed as a PWA.
pwa_background_color: The background color in the PWA manifest.
pwa_icon_any_name: The asset name of the app icon in the PWA manifest (any).
pwa_icon_any_type: The IANA media type of the app icon in the PWA manifest (any).
pwa_icon_any_sizes: The dimensions of the app icon in the PWA manifest (any).
pwa_icon_maskable_name: The asset name of the app icon in the PWA manifest (maskable).
pwa_icon_maskable_type: The IANA media type of the app icon in the PWA manifest (maskable).
pwa_icon_maskable_sizes: The dimensions of the app icon in the PWA manifest (maskable).
pwa_icon_monochrome_name: The asset name of the app icon in the PWA manifest (monochrome).
pwa_icon_monochrome_type: The IANA media type of the app icon in the PWA manifest (monochrome).
pwa_icon_monochrome_sizes: The dimensions of the app icon in the PWA manifest (monochrome).
pwa_icon_monochrome_maskable_name: The asset name of the app icon in the PWA manifest (monochrome, maskable).
pwa_icon_monochrome_maskable_type: The IANA media type of the app icon in the PWA manifest (monochrome, maskable).
pwa_icon_monochrome_maskable_sizes: The dimensions of the app icon in the PWA manifest (monochrome, maskable).
